entry.title: Dragon's Wish
entry.summary:
Author: Amacerise

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,710Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: Merlin's time is upon him, once more he must lay his brood. But on the road, tired, having contractions, he must endure until he reaches the inn just a few miles away. He retreats to the most quiet room when he arrives; alone he begins his process, until Arthur knocks.ORMerlin's Dragon Lord blood is more draconic than not, Arthur finds Merlin and helps him deliver while contemplating what it means for his desires. Honestly, this is a tender, loving, magic reveal fic disguised as weird porn, enjoy!

entry.title: Unarmoured
entry.summary:
Author: HowDidIGetHere20

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,699Chapters: 25/30Kudos: 129

Summary: Arthur has always taken Merlin on every mission — unarmoured, untrained, endlessly reckless. It never used to matter. But lately, every danger feels sharper. Every close call lasts too long. And Merlin is starting to notice the way Arthur hovers… and how the prince’s worry is beginning to look a lot like something else. A slow-burn story about devotion disguised as duty, love revealed through quiet choices, and the people who become home when the world turns dangerous. Love wins — even when it has to fight for it. Written with a companion playlist (linked in the notes) :)

entry.title: The Chains of Destiny
entry.summary:
Author: Lawrencethebloodstealer

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,287Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

entry.title: The Trial of Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,066Chapters: 47/?Kudos: 1,657

Summary: When Morgana invokes a long forgotten spell, the ancient and powerful Court of Magic is summoned to pass judgment on Uther Pendragon and his bloodline for their crimes against the magical world. But for the verdict to be carried out, every seat on the Council must be filled, and the chair of the Dragonlords has long stood empty. Now Merlin faces an impossible choice: side with his people and end Uther’s reign of terror, or save Arthur.

entry.title: Different Destiny: The Outlaw Prince
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,148Chapters: 7/25Kudos: 78

Summary: When Merlin's magic is exposed shortly before season 2 starts, the path of destiny starts changing forever. Now on the run with Arthur, Morgana, and Gwen. Merlin hopes to convince Arthur that magic is totally good instead of him and Morgana just being an exception. Morgana, meanwhile, hopes to convince him to usurp his father. As allies are gathered and Arthur realizes the injustice in his kingdom, it looks more and more like he will have to act in a drastic way. A way he dreads.   Meanwhile, Arthur and Merlin are growing closer and closer and might just have feelings for each other. Something they probably should be better about realizing, considering the example of Gwen and Morgana right next to them.   In a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom now rests on the shoulders of four, their names: Merlin, Arthur, Guinevere, and Morgana

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 186,908Chapters: 44/58Kudos: 158

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?
